Grouping V0:

10012+01102=11112 \text{1001}_{2} + \text{0110}_{2} = \text{1111}_{2} 10012​+01102​=11112​

Grouping V1: 51210=2109=1111111112\text{512}_{10} = 2^{9}_{10} = \text{111111111}_{2}51210​=2109​=1111111112​

Grouping V2: 51210=2109=1111111112\mathit{512}_{10} = 2^{9}_{10} = \mathit{111111111}_{2}51210​=2109​=1111111112​

Grouping V3: 51210=2109=1111111112\it{512}_{10} = 2^{9}_{10} = \it{111111111}_{2}51210​=2109​=1111111112​
